Introduction to the course, overview of syllabus, and how the course will work.

## Assignment
Sign up for our Discord server:

1. Sign up for the Discord using the link sent by email. You will need to create a Discord account if you do not have one already.
2. Send me a message that you have signed up so that I can assign you a role and give you access to the class channels.
3. Once you have been assigned, introduce yourself in the `#general` channel. Include a short description of your research interests.

## Activities
- Introductions
- Discussion of the course
- Discussion of interest and experience with Digital Humanities technologies.
